projects.title: Rythu Vikas
projects.shortDesc: A platform connecting farmers with buyers directly, enabling better market access and fair pricing.
projects.longDesc: Rythu Vikas is a comprehensive agricultural platform designed to bridge the gap between farmers and buyers. The platform eliminates middlemen, ensuring farmers get fair prices for their produce while buyers get fresh, quality products directly from the source. Features include real-time price tracking, quality assessment tools, logistics coordination, and secure payment systems. The platform also provides weather updates, crop advisory services, and market trend analysis to help farmers make informed decisions.
features: Secure payment gateway with escrow services
challenges: Building trust between farmers and buyers
Creating an intuitive interface for rural users
solutions: Implemented user verification and rating system
Created dynamic pricing algorithms with market data
Designed simple, icon-based UI with voice support
Integrated multiple payment gateways with fraud detection

projects.title: Pet Rescue
projects.shortDesc: A web platform dedicated to rescuing, adopting, and managing pets in need, connecting shelters with adopters.
projects.longDesc: Pet Rescue is a full-stack web application designed to streamline the process of rescuing and adopting pets. The platform connects pet shelters, volunteers, and potential adopters, allowing users to browse available pets, submit adoption requests, and manage rescue operations efficiently. It also enables admins to oversee rescue cases, monitor adoption progress, and manage user registrations, all within a clean and responsive interface.
features: User registration and login with authentication
Admin dashboard for managing rescue operations
Pet details with images, health, and rescue status
Search and filter functionality for easy browsing
challenges: Managing data consistency across different user roles
Handling image uploads and storage efficiently
solutions: Developed REST APIs using Django for smooth frontend-backend interaction
Implemented role-based authentication for admin and users
Used Django ORM for stable and efficient database management
Optimized UI with responsive components for all devices

projects.title: GTECH DSA CheatSheet
projects.shortDesc: Designed a DSA-focused website featuring 30 curated questions on Arrays and Strings with patterns, LeetCode links, and company tags to help students crack their dream placements.
projects.longDesc:
This project is a comprehensive DSA Cheatsheet focused on Arrays and Strings. It includes 30 hand-picked questions covering essential problem-solving patterns that frequently appear in coding rounds and technical interviews. These patterns include:

- Two Pointers
- Sliding Window
- Binary Search
- Stack
- HashMap
- XOR Trick
- Prefix/Suffix Arrays
- Kadane's Algorithm (DP)
- Boyer-Moore Voting Algorithm
- Brute Force to Optimization
- Simple Traversal
- In-place Swap
- 3-way Partitioning
- HashSet
- Shrinking Window
- Binary Search Variations
- Binary Search on Rotated Arrays
- Horizontal/Vertical Scanning
- Reverse Sections
- Floyd's Cycle Detection
- Math Tricks

The goal was to provide a high-quality resource to help aspiring developers practice pattern-based problem-solving efficiently.
challenges: Curating a question set that comprehensively covers key DSA patterns took significant research and time, as I wanted to ensure the content would truly help users prepare for top tech placements.
solutions: Collaborated with peers to shortlist 30 questions based on past interview experiences, frequently asked LeetCode problems, and common patterns observed in FAANG-level coding assessments.

projects.title: Epileptic Seizure Disorder Detection using Deep Learning
projects.shortDesc: An intelligent system that detects epileptic seizures from EEG signals using deep learning models for early diagnosis and treatment support.
projects.longDesc: This project focuses on developing a deep learning-based model to automatically detect epileptic seizures from EEG (electroencephalogram) data. Traditional diagnosis of epilepsy involves manual analysis of EEG signals, which is time-consuming and prone to human error. The proposed system leverages convolutional neural networks (CNNs) and LSTM architectures to classify EEG signals into normal and seizure classes with high accuracy. The model helps neurologists and medical practitioners make faster and more reliable decisions in identifying seizure patterns.
features: Automated seizure detection using deep learning models
CNN and LSTM hybrid model for improved accuracy
Data visualization for EEG patterns and classifications
Performance metrics including accuracy, precision, and recall
Model evaluation and validation using real EEG datasets
challenges: Dealing with high-dimensional and noisy EEG data
Selecting optimal deep learning architecture for time-series signals
Ensuring high accuracy with limited labeled data
solutions: Applied advanced preprocessing techniques to remove noise and artifacts
Utilized hybrid CNN-LSTM model to capture spatial and temporal features
Implemented data augmentation for balanced training
Used dropout and regularization methods to improve generalization
